summary: This bill, the 'Ending Improper Payments to Deceased People Act,' aims to improve coordination between federal and state agencies, specifically focusing on the Do Not Pay working system. It amends the Consolidated Appropriations Act of 2021 to facilitate the sharing of information from the Commissioner of Social Security with the Do Not Pay system. This will help prevent incorrect payments to deceased individuals. The bill sets an effective date of December 28, 2026 for the changes.
